title.rendered: Reliance Commercial Finance Limited joins hands with Smile Foundation to provide education to poor and underprivileged children

content.rendered:
Reliance Commercial Finance Limited joins hands with Smile Foundation to provide education to poor and underprivileged children

 

Reliance Commercial Finance Ltd associated with Smile Foundation in year 2014 to support the basic education of the underprivileged children through Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme. Reliance is currently supporting over 400 underprivileged children in locations namely Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai and Kolkata.

Reliance Commercial Finance Ltd committed to the mission of making India independent, in its true sense by enabling every Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) & retail consumer realize their true potential and become self-reliant entities. For the last 9 years, through their customized and convenient financial solutions, have helped create success stories out of over 4,00,000 MSMEs across the country and disbursed over Rs 88,000 crores to them. By empowering the customers and helping them realize their business dreams, they hope to power India’s journey towards self-reliance. Retaining the core values of Reliance Commercial Finance Ltd., They have now adopted a new brand name to signify our wide range of financial solutions that cater to our customers’ evolving financial needs.

Reliance Commercial Finance is now re-branded as Reliance Money.
